title: 36 - Ariel Elias
itunes:title: 36 - Ariel Elias
description: Hell yeah, we got Ariel Elias coming atcha with a crazy story! If you live in New York City, you’ve definitely seen her around the top comedy clubs in the city. If not, you may know her from her podcast Well Behaved. We’re talking everything from growing up Jewish, weird hecklers, stalkers, high school relationships, and more. Here’s five words to describe this episode: sometimes, your mom comes through.

itunes:author: All Things Comedy
